name: Chicken Korma
description: A rich and creamy chicken curry made with yogurt, almonds, and a blend of aromatic spices, creating a mildly spiced and flavorful dish.

name: Chicken Bhuna
description: A traditional Bangladeshi dish where chicken pieces are cooked in a thick, spicy sauce made with onions, tomatoes, garlic, and a variety of spices, until the oil separates.

name: Chicken Rezala
description: A mildly spiced chicken curry cooked in a white gravy made with yogurt, poppy seeds, cashew nuts, and a blend of subtle spices, resulting in a rich and creamy dish.

name: Chicken Jalfrezi
description: A vibrant and spicy stir-fry dish made with chicken pieces, bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes, cooked with a blend of spices for a flavorful and colorful meal.
